name: A Defender
description: Invocas a tus subordinados para formar un escudo natural frente a ti. Mientras dure el efecto y mantengas la concentraci√≥n, obtienes un +1 a tu CA.
higherLevels: El aumento a la CA para este movimiento pasa a ser +2 al nivel 5, +3 al nivel 10 y +4 al nivel 17.

effect.name: Prevents the user from being startled one time this turn.
effect.effect: You are immune to first CHA Saving Throw you would have to make this round.
